org.polarsys.chess.core.constraint

Class SettableStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.core.runtime.Status
      • org.polarsys.chess.core.constraint.SettableStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.core.runtime.IStatus

    public class SettableStatus
extends org.eclipse.core.runtime.Status
    Extends Status in order to allow the setting of properties that in Status are readonly.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.eclipse.core.runtime.Status
